#summary How to install onto a windows box

= Introduction =

Basic install instructions for a windows box


= Details =

Current install instructions:
  # Install python 2.6 
  # Install [http://pypi.python.org/pypi/setuptool easy_install] - this is for ease of use and is not required
  # Install genshi using easy_install
  # Install Twisted - for windows you need to download the exe and install that way
  # Copy the source code to a directory and run it
